MARK 1.18 jah suns afletandans þo natja seina laistidedun afar imma.
MARK 1.19 jah jainþro inngaggands framis leitilata gasaƕ Iakobu þana Zaibaidaiaus jah Iohanne broþar is, jah þans in skipa manwjandans natja.
MARK 1.20 jah suns haihait ins.
jah afletandans attan seinana Zaibaidaiu in þamma skipa miþ asnjam, galiþun afar imma.
MARK 1.21 jah galiþun in Kafarnaum, jah suns sabbato daga galeiþands in swnagogen laisida ins.
MARK 1.22 jah usfilmans waurþun ana þizai laiseinai is;
unte was laisjands ins swe waldufni habands jah ni swaswe þai bokarjos.
MARK 1.23 jah was in þizai swnagogen ize manna in unhrainjamma ahmin jah ufhropida MARK 1.24 qiþands:
fralet,
ƕa uns jah þus,
Iesu Nazorenai, qamt fraqistjan uns?
kann þuk, ƕas þu is,
sa weiha gudis.
MARK 1.25 jah andbait ina Iesus qiþands:
þahai jah usgagg ut us þamma, ahma unhrainja.
MARK 1.26 jah tahida ina ahma sa unhrainja jah hropjands stibnai mikilai usiddja us imma.
MARK 1.27 jah afslauþnodedun allai sildaleikjandans, swaei sokidedun miþ sis misso qiþandans:
ƕa sijai þata?
ƕo so laiseino so niujo, ei miþ waldufnja jah ahmam þaim unhrainjam anabiudiþ jah ufhausjand imma?
MARK 1.28 usiddja þan meriþa is suns and allans bisitands Galeilaias.
MARK 1.29 jah suns us þizai swnagogen usgaggandans qemun in garda Seimonis jah Andraiins miþ Iakobau jah Iohannen.
MARK 1.30 iþ swaihro Seimonis lag in brinnon:
jah suns qeþun imma bi ija.
MARK 1.31 jah duatgaggands urraisida þo undgreipands handu izos, jah aflailot þo so brinno suns, jah andbahtida im.
MARK 1.32 andanahtja þan waurþanamma, þan gasaggq sauil, berun du imma allans þans ubil habandans jah unhulþons habandans.
MARK 1.33 jah so baurgs alla garunnana was at daura.
MARK 1.34 jah gahailida managans ubil habandans missaleikaim sauhtim jah unhulþons managos uswarp jah ni fralailot rodjan þos unhulþons, unte kunþedun ina.
MARK 1.35 jah air uhtwon usstandands usiddja jah galaiþ ana auþjana staþ jah jainar baþ.
MARK 1.36 jah galaistans waurþun imma Seimon jah þai miþ imma.
MARK 1.37 jah bigitandans ina qeþun du imma þatei allai þuk sokjand.
MARK 1.38 jah qaþ du im:
gaggam du þaim bisunjane haimom jah baurgim, ei jah jainar merjau,
unte duþe qam.
MARK 1.39 jah was merjands in swnagogim ize and alla Galeilaian jah unhulþons uswairpands.
MARK 1.40 jah qam at imma þrutsfill habands, bidjands ina jah kniwam knussjands jah qiþands du imma þatei
jabai wileis, magt mik gahrainjan.
MARK 1.41 iþ Iesus infeinands, ufrakjands handu seina attaitok imma jah qaþ imma:
wiljau,
wairþ hrains.
MARK 1.42 jah biþe qaþ þata Iesus, suns þata þrutsfill aflaiþ af imma, jah hrains warþ.
MARK 1.43 jah gaƕotjands imma suns ussandida ina MARK 1.44 jah qaþ du imma:
saiƕ ei mannhun ni qiþais waiht;
ak gagg þuk silban ataugjan gudjin jah atbair fram gahraineinai þeinai þatei anabauþ Moses du weitwodiþai im.
MARK 1.45 iþ is usgaggands dugann merjan filu jah usqiþan þata waurd, swaswe is juþan ni mahta andaugjo in baurg galeiþan, ak uta ana auþjaim stadim was;
jah iddjedun du imma allaþro.
MARK 2.1 Jah galaiþ aftra in Kafarnaum afar dagans,
jah gafrehun þatei in garda ist.
MARK 2.2 jah suns gaqemun managai, swaswe juþan ni gamostedun nih at daura, jah rodida im waurd.
MARK 2.3 jah qemun at imma usliþan bairandans, hafanana fram fidworim.
MARK 2.4 jah ni magandans neƕa qiman imma faura manageim, andhulidedun hrot þarei was Iesus jah usgrabandans insailidedun þata badi ana þammei lag sa usliþa.
MARK 2.5 gasaiƕands þan Iesus galaubein ize qaþ du þamma usliþin:
